backend/main.mo: Defines delivery order types, user profiles, role-based authorization, and storage-backed order and photo management logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, theming, and base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document setting metadata, app icons, manifest, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest configuring app name, icons, theme colors, and startup behavior.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing basic caching for offline access and asset versioning.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, auth-based redirects, profile setup flow, and global providers.
frontend/src/areas/admin/AdminShell.tsx: Admin interface shell with dashboard and orders tabs wrapped in the AppSurface layout.
frontend/src/areas/admin/pages/AdminDash: Displays admin order statistics using fetched orders and shows counts by status in cards.
frontend/src/areas/admin/pages/AdminOrde: Shows detailed admin view of an order, including addresses, photos, status, and rider assignment form.
Lists all orders with filtering by status and supports navigating to a detailed order view.
frontend/src/areas/customer/components/C: Renders a bottom navigation bar allowing customers to switch between booking, orders, and profile tabs.
frontend/src/areas/customer/CustomerShel: Provides tab-based navigation for customer pages and renders the active section inside the app layout.
frontend/src/areas/customer/pages/Custom: Form for customers to create delivery orders with pickup/delivery details and optional parcel photo upload.
Displays a customer's order details including status, addresses, and photos, with a back button and WhatsApp action.
Displays the customer's orders list with loading/empty states and opens a detail page when an order is selected.
Shows customer profile info, app install option, and logout action.
frontend/src/areas/rider/components/Ride: Renders a bottom navigation bar for riders to switch between orders and profile tabs.
frontend/src/areas/rider/pages/RiderOrde: Displays detailed rider order info with status updates, navigation, and proof photo upload.
Lists rider-assigned orders with loading/empty states and navigates to order details.
frontend/src/areas/rider/pages/RiderProf: Shows rider profile details, install option, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/areas/rider/RiderShell.tsx: Provides the main rider UI shell with tab navigation between orders and profile pages.
frontend/src/components/actions/WhatsApp: Provides a WhatsApp contact button with a fallback dialog and message copy option.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message with options to go back or sign out.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppSurfac: Wraps pages in a styled full-screen surface container.
frontend/src/components/photos/PhotoCapt: UI component allowing users to take photos via camera or upload files, using a camera hook and dialog interface.
frontend/src/components/pwa/InstallAppBu: Button that triggers PWA installation using a custom install prompt hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminOrders.ts: Hooks for admins to fetch orders, filter by status, and assign riders with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Hooks to fetch the current user's profile, admin status, and clear all cached user data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading identity on startup and exposing login/clear actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Hooks for creating orders, fetching the user's orders, and retrieving a specific order with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/usePhotoUploads.ts: Hooks to upload parcel and proof photos to the backend, invalidating related order queries.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAInstallPrompt.t: Captures the browser's beforeinstallprompt event to manage PWA installation state and trigger installation.
frontend/src/hooks/useRiderActions.ts: Hook allowing riders to update order status and triggering query invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining custom color themes, gradients, and utility classes for styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/auth/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen invoking Internet Identity authentication with styled UI and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/auth/ProfileSetupPage: React page for creating a user profile with name and role selection, submitting to backend and handling loading and errors.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on page load and logs success or failure.
frontend/src/utils/deepLinks.ts: Utility functions to build WhatsApp and Google Maps URLs, generate WhatsApp messages, and copy text to clipboard.
frontend/src/utils/fileToBytes.ts: Converts files to byte arrays, creates image URLs from bytes, and revokes created URLs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, persisting parameters, and cleaning them from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app goals, architecture, required images, and implemented features with versions.
